explanation: The overall sentiment for BTC is strongly bullish, with numerous participants expressing confidence in new all-time highs, strong upward momentum, and persistent buying interest. Many comments point to large resistance levels being broken, FOMO (fear of missing out) and short squeezes driving price up, and an expectation of continued rallies. While a few users mention short-term retracements or minor corrections, the consensus is that any dips are opportunities to buy, and the long-term trajectory remains upward. The chat also frequently discusses leverage and high profit expectations, reflecting strong bullish conviction.
